author: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JCA (delivering the judgment of the court):
casenumber: Court of Appeal — Civil Appeal No 157 of 2020 (Summonses Nos 6 and 19 of 2021)
casename: Aathar Ah Kong Andrew v OUE Lippo Healthcare Ltd
coram: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JCA, Woo Bih Li JAD and Quentin Loh JAD
counsel: Chow Chao Wu Jansen and Sasha Anselm Gonsalves (Rajah & Tann Singapore LLP) for the applicant in CA/SUM 19/2021; Henry Li-Zheng Setiono and Daniel Tan An Ye (Ang & Partners) for the applicant in CA/SUM 6/2021; The respondent in CA/SUM 6/2021 and CA/SUM 19/2021 in person;Beverly Wee (Insolvency & Public Trustee’s Office) for the Official Assignee (watching brief).

headings.text: Facts and procedural history pertaining to CA 157
Preliminary issue: Deemed withdrawal of CA 157
Whether this court should grant an extension of time for the striking-out application to be made
Whether the NOA should be struck out
